short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JCP+ is offered by JCPenney's digital operations team to support web browser related automation activities to improve productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JCP+ is built and offered by Digital Ops team, Bangalore to support web browser related automation activities for www.jcpenney.com.

Any JCPenney associate can install and use this extension to improve productivity.
